attr.title: Snowman Stack
attr.desc: A puzzle game where you have to switch pieces in order to make a snowman (hat on top, head, then body). It has 5 game modes: Stages, Forever, Panic, Battle, and CO-OP.
attr.inst: Download the 'Linux Download (.love)' game free at itch.io (https://alesan99.itch.io/snowman-stack). Extract and drop the 'snowman stack.love' file into the 'ports/snowmanstack' folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the **Linux Download (.love)** game free at [itch.io](https://alesan99.itch.io/snowman-stack). Extract and drop the `snowman stack.love` file into the `ports/snowmanstack` folder.
